title: 15594 E Arizona Ave #302
app_fee: $30 per adult app fee, covers credit check, processing the application.
posting_body: ['TEXT', 'show contact info', 'NOW FOR MORE INFO!', 'AREA: Aurora - Great Location near Arizona and Chambers!', 'FEATURES: Completely updated unit featuring fireplace, amazing spiral staircase leading to a spacious loft and more!', 'INCLUDED UTILITIES:', 'Water, sewer, trash, and snow removal!', 'TENANT PAID UTILITIES:', 'All other utilities paid by tenant.', 'BEDROOMS & BATHROOMS: 2 Bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, and loft!', 'KITCHEN APPLIANCES INCLUDED: Refrigerator, Stove, Microwave, and Dishwasher.', 'LAUNDRY:', 'Stackable washer/dryer hookups.', 'FLOORING: Laminate in kitchen and new carpet throughout.', 'HEAT/COOLING: Gas Heat, Central AC!', 'PARKING: Open, uncovered parking.', 'FENCING: Lovely patio.', 'BASEMENT: No basement.', 'RESTRICTIONS:', 'Pets considered with a one-time non-refundable pet fee of $250 per pet.', 'Sorry', 'but we cannot allow any of the following breeds of dog: American Pit Bull Terrier, American Staffordshire Terrier, and Staffordshire Bull Terrier', 'SECURITY DEPOSIT:', "Security deposit is equal to one month's rent.", 'APPLICATION FEE: $30 per adult.', 'AVAILABILITY DATE: August 10TH!', "**Applicants must be able to start a lease within 1 week of the property's listed availability date.", '**', 'LEASE TERM: Initial lease to end April through June of 2023 with 12-month extensions possible at that time.', 'Growing marijuana inside or outside the premises is not allowed, smoking of any kind inside the property is not allowed.', 'Minimum 700 credit score required.']
